channel.title: PapaScott
channel.description: I'm married to a German and I like it!

item.title: Block E
item.description:
I‚Äôve been asked about my profile photo. Wikipedia has this to say about Block E.

After 1950‚Ä¶ lower Hennepin Avenue became known as a place for drunks, crime, and prostitution. Block E was the center of the squalor. The 620 Club in 1971 gave way to Moby Dick‚Äôs, and became known as one of the city‚Äôs most seedy bars. Unsavory establishments, including rough bars, flophouses, and an adult movie theater settled in on Block E in the 1970s and 1980s‚Ä¶

By the 1980s, the block was one of the choice places in Minneapolis for punks to hang out and it became a creative breeding ground for the local punk music scene. Block E was also known for its cheap rent, drawing such establishments as Rifle Sport Gallery. From the mid-1980s forward, the Minneapolis police had a constant presence in the area; it was normal to see squad cars or a police van parked between the northbound traffic lanes and contraflow bus lane.

Block E looked pretty much like this when I started college in Minneapolis in 1980. The owner-operator of the McDonald‚Äôs was my wife‚Äôs first boss, she worked at the City Center location across the street.

Block E was demolished in 1988 and became a parking lot.

item.title: Hard to Get
item.description:
You‚Äôd think in the current German coalition talks that the SPD could at least play hard to get.

Now I know German politics is a strange beast, but I would think that the SPD side more has more pull here. The Union is the side that needs desperately to form a coalition with Merkel in charge. The SPD never wanted a new grand coalition (so they claim), you‚Äôd think they could take or leave it, and demand a high price to take it.

Then again, what do I know?

item.title: Winter Workshop
item.description:
How our son spent his Christmas vacation (at least when he wasn‚Äôt studying for his preliminary ‚ÄúVorabi‚Äù exams):

Winterarbeit Diesen Winter bin ich der Flugzeugbetreuer unseres Astir CS Jeans in Wenzendorf und so hab ich die Gelegenheit genutzt, meine neuerworbenen F√§higkeiten und Kenntnisse als Zellenwart in FVK-Bauweise anzuwenden, indem ich ein neues L√ºftungsgitter einlaminiert habe. Es hei√üt ja "Asche zu Asche, Harz zu Harz" oder so √§hnlich ü§îüòÑ Mit dem Gesamtergebnis bin ich sehr zufrieden und wertet den Harzklumpen mit dem neulackierten I-Brett optisch zu mindestens ein bissel auf :D (Auf dem letzten Bild sieht man das I-Brett in der alten Lacke - so h√§sslich sah der Rest auch etwa aus) #winter #winterarbeit #flugpause #astir #grob #flugzeugwart #zellenwart #laminieren #harzen #gfk #harz #ichundmeinharz #glasfaser #k√∂pergewebe #segelfliegen #gliding #soaring #segelflugzeug #glider #sailplane #wenzendorf #hfbfluggemeinschaft #lxnav #s80

A post shared by Christopher Hanson (@gliding_aviation) on Jan 11, 2018 at 9:50am PST

item.title: New Screen Saver
item.description:
How stunning is this? A perspective that will never get old... üòç ___ Photo by @rudanmanuel. If you want your photo to be chosen as #picoftheweek, tag it with #Elbphilharmonie and follow @elbphilharmonie on Instagram.

item.title: Spam Filter
item.description:
A post shared by Scott Hanson (@papascott62) on Jan 4, 2018 at 10:40am PST

When wiring our addition we also installed an integrated spam filter. I‚Äôve exposed part of it here. Internet comes in through the yellow cable and spam flows out through the tube to the municipal waste water system.

item.title: Katchi
item.description:
It‚Äôs time to start blogging again, and I can think of no better way to start than these lyrics from Nick Waterhouse‚Ä¶

Doo wop a doo wop, shoopi doobi doo wop
Doo wop a doo wop, shoopi doobi doo wop
Doo wop a doo wop, shoopi doobi doo wop
Doo wop a doo wop, shoopi doobi doo wop‚Ä¶

Although shouldn‚Äôt that ‚Äúshoopi‚Äù actually be a ‚Äúshooby‚Äù?

item.title: Tee Time For Two
item.description:
My gmail address is fairly generic, and apparently there are other people who would like to be PapaScott but can‚Äôt. So I get a fair amount of mail intended for other PapaScotts, including:

  • confirmation for my tee time at a golf club in Pennsylvania
  • notice of automatic deposit of my salary from the State of Tennessee
  • my reservation for one week at a mobile home park in Georgia
  • advertising from a car dealer in Argentina
  • an appeal in French to donate (or sell, I can‚Äôt tell) my blood plasma to a clinic in Paris
  • invitation of regular lunches of ex-military folks in Tennessee
  • regular notices of transactions (with scans of receipts) from my Well Fargo bank account in Georgia

And I‚Äôm not even looking in my spam folder. I have enough keeping track of my own schedule without having to worry items for total strangers!

item.title: Travis CI
item.description: So, yeah, I figured out how to use Travis CI to build my Jekyll blog and push it to GitHub Pages, and figured that I would actually write something for it to build rather than just fiddle with scripts and yaml files in the background.

item.title: The Future Part 2
item.description:
Last fall we converted our restaurant in Dibbersen into a Restaurant of the Future. Now we‚Äôve remodeled our Hamburg, Winsener Stra√üe restaurant so now we have doubled the future!

The lobby here has a more urban theme that fits our gritty part of Hamburg. I was worried it would be too dark, but the spots of color make it look brighter live than it appears in the photos.

It of course has all the innovations in Dibbersen, plus we now serve ‚ÄúBarista Quality‚Äù coffee at the front counter, meaning that the espresso drinks are made with the portafilter machine in McCaf√©.

With all this future we need to take time to catch our breaths. Our 3rd drive-thru restaurant on the Autobahn A1 at Rade will join the future in early 2018.
